forumNotes.author: Bobberbob
forumNotes.content:
Hi  

When using USB Multiboot 10, the DOS windows opens and after a key (as is asked) I do get an error report, saying: File $OEM$ is Missing  

I simply cannot find a file by that name. What am I doing wrong?  

I use USB Multiboot on my Windows machine (XP Pro), my WIndows Setup CD is in the drive.  

I plan to install Windows on my Aspire One from a USB stick  

Can anybody help me out?
